# ion-reorder-group

ReorderGroup is a wrapper component for items with the Reorder element. For more information, see the [Reorder docs](../reorder/)

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### disabled

boolean

If true, the reorder will be hidden. Defaults to `true`.


## Attributes

#### disabled

boolean

If true, the reorder will be hidden. Defaults to `true`.
